prokimenon: Your merciful love and Your truth
I waited, I waited for the Lord and He stooped down to me; He heard my cry.
second_prokimenon: As for me, I said:* Lord, have mercy on me;
Blessed are those who consider the poor and the weak.
aposticha: Now is the acceptable time, now is the day of salvation.* According to the multitude of Your mercies visit my soul,* and release me from the burden of my transgressions,* for You alone love mankind.
